subject: Bowl Games
Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Dexter McCluster rushed for 182 yards and 2 touchdowns as Mississippi beat No. 21 Oklahoma State, 21-7, in a sloppy Cotton Bowl.
snippet: Dexter McCluster rushed for 182 yards and 2 touchdowns as Mississippi beat No. 21 Oklahoma State, 21-7, in a sloppy Cotton Bowl.
